title: British Woman Discovers 12-Year-Old Afghan Foster Child Is 21-Year-Old Jihadi?
subtitle: A British tabloid reported that a mother discovered her 12-year-old Afghan foster child was really an adult terrorist but offered no proof for the story.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A 12-year-old Afghan foster child in the U.K. turned out to be a 21-year-old trained "jihadi."
